Body:
"""
    Test symbolic origin wrt corresponding numeric form.
    """
n = 11
m = 20
row = 'utclb'
col = 'lcr'
xc = [0, n // 2, n - 1]
yc = [0, 0, m // 2, m - 1, m - 1]
np.random.seed(0)
IM = np.random.random((m, n))
for r, y in zip(row, yc):
    for c, x in zip(col, xc):
        assert_equal(harmonics(IM, r + c), harmonics(IM, (y, x)), err_msg=
            '-> origin "{}" != {}'.format(r + c, (y, x)))
